field.description: Date of track recording session. Format YYYY[-MM[-DD]] - day & month optional

field.description: Either Save and re-read the ID3 artwork, or Save and copy the artwork from the album, or select picture below and then save

field.name: image_mime

field.name: image_height

field.name: image_size

field.description: Size of embedded image in kB

field.name: image_type

field.name: image_desc

field.name: picturefile
field.label: Track Picture
field.description: If no ID3 picture available you can upload and select one here. If track ha an album, and album image is not already set this one will be assigned

field.name: album_id
field.label: Album
field.description: A track can belong to only one album, if it is not already in the list it will be created from the ID3 tag data if avaiable

field.name: discno
field.label: Disc No
field.description: Disc number of multi-disc set if appropriate. Use format N/M where N is the disc number and M is the number of discs in the album set. Leave blank for singledisc. The number may be followed by a space and a title for the disc in the set that makes the album - eg '1/2 Live Concert, 2/2 Studio Recording

field.name: trackno
field.label: Track number
field.description: Number of the track on the disc. Multi disc sets will usually re-start at 1 on each disc. CDs of original double LP releases will often not include the original disc and track numbering but simply number them sequentially across the LPs in the ID3 data, or even reorder the original sequence. Re-releases often include 'bonus'tracks' added to the end of the original order - you might wish to label these as a separate disc

field.name: songlist
field.label: Songs(s)
field.description: Track may be medley of several songs

field.name: artistlist
field.label: Artists(s)
field.description: Track may have several artists, album artist may be listed separately

field.name: playlistlist
field.label: Playlists
field.description: Track may may appear in several playlists

field.name: ext_links

field.description: Links to associated information for the track
